scripts.clean:deep: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter *.tsbuildinfo | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue packages\core\dist,packages\auth\dist,packages\enforcement\dist,packages\framework\dist,packages\commands\dist,examples\canonical-flow-demo\dist; $targets=@('packages\core','packages\auth','packages\enforcement','packages\framework','packages\commands','examples\canonical-flow-demo'); foreach($t in $targets){ Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue (Join-Path $t 'src\*.js'),(Join-Path $t 'src\*.js.map'),(Join-Path $t 'src\*.d.ts'),(Join-Path $t 'src\*.d.ts.map') }"
